    • Uses of HiveAuthorizationProvider in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization

      Subinterfaces of HiveAuthorizationProvider in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  HiveMetastoreAuthorizationProvider
      HiveMetastoreAuthorizationProvider : An extension of HiveAuthorizaytionProvider that is intended to be called from the metastore-side.
      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.security.authorization that implement HiveAuthorizationProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BitSetCheckedAuthorizationProvider 
      class  DefaultHiveAuthorizationProvider 
      class  DefaultHiveMetastoreAuthorizationProvider 
      class  HiveAuthorizationProviderBase 
      class  HiveMultiPartitionAuthorizationProviderBase
      Abstract class that allows authorization of operations on partition-sets.
      class  MetaStoreAuthzAPIAuthorizerEmbedOnly
      If this authorizer is used, it allows authorization api to be invoked only in embedded metastore mode.
      class  StorageBasedAuthorizationProvider
      StorageBasedAuthorizationProvider is an implementation of HiveMetastoreAuthorizationProvider that tries to look at the hdfs permissions of files and directories associated with objects like databases, tables and partitions to determine whether or not an operation is allowed.
